group_1.textLeft: So you were attacked by a Magical Girl from@the east in a Labyrinth in Chuo Ward...

group_1.textRight: One hundred percent. She said it herself.

group_1.narration: "A Magical Girl from a rival ward."

group_1.textLeft: None of the Chuo Ward Magical Girls...
...claim that area as their territory, right?

group_1.textRight: Nope, I checked! That's the only reason I@even went there.
I wasn't sure if I should, but I couldn't@just ignore a Witch.

group_1.textLeft: I'm also just making sure here, but had@anyone arrived there before you?

group_1.textRight: No, not that I could see. If there was, I@would've left it for them to deal with.

group_1.textLeft: You didn't do anything wrong, Momoko.

group_1.textRight: She's right. If there weren't any Chuo Ward@Magical Girls claiming that territory...
Then you weren't violating the agreement.@You can freely hunt Witches there.

group_1.textLeft: Yes... It looks like it has finally begun.
Have you told anyone about this, Momoko?

group_1.textRight: No, just you two. I haven't even told Rena@or Kaede.
I didn't want to rile people up.
You guys don't want to either, right?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry this had to happen...

group_1.textRight: You don't have to act all polite. We're on@the same team, ya know.
Maybe this is weird to say, but I'm glad I@was the one who was attacked.
You guys should be able to take care of this,@right?
Do you think we can wrap this up neatly@before others find out what happened?
Worst case, this spirals into a huge fight@that leads to both sides falling...

group_1.textLeft: Let's do what we can before considering the@worst-case scenario.

group_1.textRight: Then we'll start by talking to Kanagi.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. In a way...this may be a good@opportunity.
Now we have a just cause on our side that@can give us leverage when we negotiate.
Mifuyu, I'm prepared to do this. How about@you?

group_1.textRight: Yes... I will prepare myself as well.
